categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: Snow Wolves was a clone unit within the Grand Army of the Republic.
Along with Calm Tree and Wildfire, Snow Wolves was one of the clone units that were dispatched to aid Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano on the raid on Nuvo Vindi's laboratory on Naboo.
